main.name: Zeyu Liu
main.description: My desire to continuously learn will always be my greatest strength. Currently looking for a full-stack role.
main.bio: Hi! I am a full stack web developer with a background in finance and e-commerce. After I graduated from the University of Waterloo, I started off my career as a Trade Control Analyst for CIBC. Along the way, I ventured off in the field of e-commerce and was able to find sucess and established my own company; Ikigai & Soul Â®. As sales grew, I commited myself to being an entrepreneur full time and left my job at CIBC after a memorable year. Some would call it fate, as my decision to become a business owner is what led me to discover my passion for programming. Managaing an online store meant I would not only have to tend to the business side, but also issues behind the scenes. I started playing around with tweaking small snippets of HTML/Javascript to implement basic design changes for my website. As my interest grew stronger, there were more and more features I wanted to implement but did not have the knowledge to. That's when I decided to enroll in the 12 week web development bootcamp at Lighthouse Labs. As the founder of a mid-sized e-commerce company,  I am passionate about creating seamless user interfaces that can generate maximum results. That passion along with my 3 years of experience in the financial industry, has given me the skills to bridge the gap between business and technology.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

projects.title: roomR
projects.category: Optimized Roomate finding App built on Express
projects.description: Colobration project that looks to simplify the roomate finding experience based on personality. Built using NodeJs, Express, Sequelize, Google Maps API & TalkJS API

projects.title: Drac's Snack
projects.category: A Simplified online food ordering app
projects.description: A web app that simplifies online food ordering. Built on Node.js, Express, Knex, PostgresSQL & Twilio API.

projects.title: Chatty App
projects.category: SPA chat app built with react and websocket
projects.description: A client-side SPA (single-page app) built with ReactJS, Webpack, Babel, Node.js and Web Sockets. The client-side app communicates with a server via WebSockets for multi-user real-time updates. No persistent database is involved; the focus is on the client-side experience and using ReactJS for real time updates.
